data.text:
#WomensDaySpecial
Tell us about a special woman in your life & stand a chance to win a credit voucher on your next online booking. To avail it, send us your booking details on indiaafkl-marketing@klm.com. 
For Terms and Conditions of the Contest click https://t.co/Fbm6G7ywob

data.text:
Happy Women's Day to all the strong and independent women out there!
Enjoy Flat 20% off on your next booking online till 11th March 2019. Use Coupon Code AFWDMARBME on payments page!
For more information visit: https://t.co/NCiTKoeDAk
Stay tuned for more #WomensDaySpecial https://t.co/BTKTy4IHcL

data.text: @Sharief55908060 @airfrance Hello Sharief, we regret the inconvenience caused. May we request you to share the baggage tag numbers for us to check internally and assist. Kind Regards.

@vijaygulani Hello Vijay, to be able to clearly understand your query and assist you better, we request you to call our "Customer Contact Centre" at Toll free number 1800-4192-033. (Mon-Fri , 8am - 8pm and Sat - Sun & Public Holidays (9am - 5pm) Kind Regards
@jinal1211 Hello Jinal, we are very sorry for the inconvenience caused. Our colleagues from the Customer Care services will connect with you today. Regards
@jahaanavi Thank you.

Nothing is more important than celebrating a festival with your loved ones. This #Diwali we had a little surprise planned for our customers who were flying home for the festival. We were truly delighted to share the festive joy with them as they reunited with their loved ones. https://t.co/ZJ3QkchqU1
https://t.co/5JxB1aRN8K

data.text:
Air France is honored to receive the award for the Best Business Lounge – International at the Travel & Leisure India Readers awards 2018.
We thank our customers for appreciating our services and voting for the Business Lounge at Hall L ,  Charles de Gaulle as the best choice.

@ishaachitnis Hello Isha, we recommend that you speak to our colleagues at the Customer Contact Centre at toll free 1800-4192-033. They are available from 08:00 AM until 08:00 PM (Mon-Fri) and 09:00 AM to 05:00 PM (Sat-Sun). They will be happy to assist you. Kind Regards

@RealKidEngineer Hello Avishek, you can connect with our Customer Contact Centre at toll free 1800-4192-033 or at 91 11 124 623 3502. Our colleagues are available from 08:00 AM to 08:00 PM (Mon - Fri) and 09:00 AM to 05:00 PM (Sat-Sun) and will be happy to help you. Kind Regards

@girishku Hello Girish, you can connect with our Customer Contact Centre at toll free 1800-4192-033 or at 91 11 124 623 3502. Our colleagues are available from 08:00 AM to 08:00 PM (Mon - Fri) and 09:00 AM to 05:00 PM (Sat-Sun) Kind Regards

@tariqaftandon Hello Tariqa, we regret the inconvenience caused . You can try checking for window seat at the airport check-in counter. Our colleagues will assist you in case any available. Kind Regards

data.text: @jaideep_2009 @airfrance Dear Sir, we apologise for any inconvenience caused. Request you to please contact our local staff at Luxembourg, on the number mentioned in the file received by you at the airport.  Kind Regards
@LemonSingh Hello Sir, we understand that our customer care team has responded to your query. You are requested to contact the operating carrier regarding your claim. Thanks and Regards

@rakesh707 Hello Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused while blocking your seat online. Request you to call our "Customer Contact Centre" at Toll free number 1800-4192-033 or 91 124 6233502. (Mon-Fri , 8am-7pm and Sat - Sun (9am-5pm) and they can assist you. Kind Regards
@LemonSingh Hello Sir, may we request you to share your file reference number please? You can do so by sending us a private message. Thanks

@bittu_17 Hello Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused. Request you to call our "Customer Contact Centre" at Toll free number 1800-4192-033 or 91 124 6233502. (Mon-Fri , 8am - 7pm and Sat - Sun (9am - 5pm). Kind Regards
@yelisette Hello Ma'am, we request you to call our "Customer Contact Centre" at Toll free number 1800-4192-033 or 91 124 6233502. (Mon-Fri , 8am - 7pm and Sat - Sun (9am - 5pm). Kind Regards

@jppandith Hello Sir, you can check for your flight status on our website or call our "Customer Contact Centre" at Toll free number 1800-4192-033 or 91 124 6233502. (Mon-Fri , 8am - 7pm and Sat - Sun (9am - 5pm). Kind Regards

data.text: @ab_gupta Hello Sir, we do take care of pets flying aboard our airline. However please note that only cats and dogs (with few exceptions) are permitted as accompanied pets. For more information, please see our website link here: https://t.co/dL1YJeCrBJ . Kind Regards

@KiranMehraK Hello Ma'am , there are different offers and promotions launched from time to time in each country. We suggest that you see our website choosing the country of your residence. Best Regards
